articles.author: Gabriel Gavin
articles.title: Putin claims new world order upon us in rambling Ukraine rant - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: Doubling down on his rationale for unleashing war, the Russian leader offered a more upbeat economic message than his own Central Bank.
articles.content: Russia’s economy might have taken a battering since its invasion of Ukraine but all is going to plan, President Vladimir Putin declared, arguing his country has made a permanent break with the West.… [+1920 chars]

articles.title: European Central Bank Hikes Rates To 22-year High - OilPrice.com
articles.description: The European Central Bank ECB hashiked interest ratesby 25 basis points to 3.5%,the highest level in 22 years on Thursday.
